entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
